name: saskatchewan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a province (= a large area that is governed as part of a country) of central Canada, whose capital city is Regina: Near-average temperatures were recorded in the Prairie Provinces of Saskatchewan and Manitoba.
More examplesFewer examples A native of Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, he acquired his first skates and hockey stick at age 5.I grew up on the empty plains of Saskatchewan. The disease has also infected ranched elk in Canada's Saskatchewan province.The evening concert will include performances by vocalists Rita Coolidge, a Cherokee, and Buffy Sainte-Marie, who was born on the Cree reservation in Saskatchewan.
